data.title: Mei & Mo's Weeger Spice: The Only Spice You'll Ever Need by Mei & Mo — Kickstarter
data.name: Mei & Mo
data.description: When you taste Weeger Spice you'll ask, "What IS that?"... in a good way!

data.title: Boujie Baking Goes Big! by Cassie Forrington — Kickstarter
data.name: Cassie Forrington
data.description: Boujie Baking Co., a one-woman op, has been accepted for sale at Whole Foods! Beer + Dessert = AWESOME. Become a beer-kissed backer!

data.title: SOSU Barrel-Aged Sriracha by Sosu Sauces — Kickstarter
data.name: Sosu Sauces
data.description: Aged in whiskey barrels for a unique fruity, spicy, and smoky flavor. You’ve never tasted sriracha quite like this before.
